Class Menu

java.lang.Object
  Menu

public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object

Menu Class outputs a menu to the user informing them of the options and operations they ask the program to perform converting from decimal to binary decimal to hexadecimal binary to decimal, binary to hexadecimal, hexidecimal to decimal, hexidecimal to binary and 7 to quit

Version:
2/16/2018
Author:
Eric Davey

method display outputs menu to user asking what conversion they wish to preform

getSelection

public int getSelection()
method getSelection declares variables int sel and prompts the user for an input to assign to variable sel, (preforms error checking, though not complete) and returns selection

Returns:
int sel, returns integer with value that will be used to determine which menu choice the user whats to select.
